prop.head.headtext: Thorburn, Law of Confidential Business Information

para.paratext: The purpose of this chapter has been to define the parameters of confidential business information. Most information of a business, commercial or technical nature will be capable of protection. The primary requirement used by the courts in the determination has been whether to protect information is whether the information has actually been held in confidence by the party seeking the protection. Most courts have also required that the information have some independent economic value or offer a business advantage to its owner.
